turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, can I order something for a pick up at Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like an iced vanilla latte with a pump of caramel and skim milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, let me order that for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you make the size of venti, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you said a venti iced vanilla latte with a pump of caramel and skim milk, is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i have ordered your drink, it will be ready for pickup in 10 minutes at the Starbucks in westlake shopping center, daly city, ca, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's not correct. Can you order it at the Litchfield Turnpike area in Woodbridge?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you said you want your order sent to the lichburg turnpike starbucks right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, the Litchfield Turnpike in Woodbridge, Connecticut.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, the lichfield turnpike starbucks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: let me see when your order will be ready.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, it will be ready for pickup in about 8 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome. Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. Sounds good. Nope. This was perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
